    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114655</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114655</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Extrinsic p-type semiconductor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Äußerer Ptyp Halbleiter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">P-type extrinsèque semi-conducteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">P-tipo extrinsic semicondutor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">P-tipo estrinseco semiconduttore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξωγενής ημιαγωγός π-τύπων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">P-tipo extrínseco semiconductor</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that doping silicon with a trivalent atom creates an extra positive hole. Semiconductors with extra positive holes are called p-type semiconductors.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Doping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extrinsic semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free electron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">p-type semiconductor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Silicon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Trivalent atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß dem das Lackieren 
des Silikons mit einem dreiwertigen Atom eine positive Extrabohrung 
erstellt. Halbleiter mit positiven Extrabohrungen werden Ptypen 
Halbleiter genannt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cela le dopage du 
silicium avec un atome trivalent crée un trou positif 
supplémentaire. Des semi-conducteurs avec les trous positifs 
supplémentaires s'appellent le p-type semi-conducteurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que isso doping o silicone
com um átomo trivalent cría um furo positivo extra. Os 
semicondutores com furos positivos extra são chamados p-tipo 
semicondutores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quello verniciare 
il silicone con un atomo trivalente crea un foro positivo 
supplementare. I semiconduttori con i fori positivi 
supplementari sono chiamati p-tipo semiconduttori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η νάρκωση του πυριτίου
με ένα τρισθενές άτομο δημιουργεί μια πρόσθετη θετική τρύπα. 
Οι ημιαγωγοί με τις πρόσθετες θετικές τρύπες καλούνται 
ημιαγωγούς π-τύπων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que eso el doping del 
silicio con un átomo trivalente crea un agujero positivo adicional. 
Los semiconductores con los agujeros positivos adicionales se 
llaman p-tipo semiconductores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lackieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">äußerer Halbleiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">freies Elektron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
